main event: An unidentified flying object was observed hovering silently above the ground in Mt. Carmel, Pennsylvania, on November 28, 1967.
interesting points: The object was elliptical-shaped, approximately 30-40 feet in diameter.,The witness observed the object for 5-10 minutes before it suddenly accelerated away.,The object appeared to be reflecting sunlight and was dull silver in color.,The sighting was reported to the local police and the Air Force.,The weather conditions were clear with unlimited visibility.
sighted object: an elliptical-shaped object providing a dull silver reflection and hovering silently
